entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Peek to definition on a definition is kinda useless #68079
  • CI test failure: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Rename.RenameEngineTests+VisualBasicConflicts.RenameAttributeFromUsage #68073

Closed

  • Please make nodes Equatable #68070
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #68026
  • Assertion in NullableWalker.VisitConditionalOperatorCore failing in bootstrap build #67975
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Move potential expensive task of ItemManager to ThreadPool #68082
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update DiaSym version details #68080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix up implementation for parameterless requests. #68077
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Transform factory #68072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add SelectAsArrayAsync which allows passing state explicitly #68071
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break cycles in attribute binding #68067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #68078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update roslyn-integration-corehost default queue #68074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add archived feeds (#67430) #68075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #68065
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Debugger.Contracts to 17.6.0-beta.23252.1 #68060
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • LocalBinderFactory - visit erroneous ForEachVariableStatementSyntax.Variable to prepare it for error recovery binding. #68034
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix conditional operator nullable walker assertion #67977
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Use a weak event handler pattern for GlobalOptionService #68062
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Additional work to release unused PreviewWorkspace memory #68054
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Finalize testing and implementation around object initializers for inline arrays. #68064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.7
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on SymbolStartAnalysisContext and SymbolAnalysisContext #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
